questions: We agreed to meet next week.
She is planning to start her own business.
Ella planea iniciar su propio negocio.
I want to see that movie.
They need to finish the project.
He offered to help us study.
Él se ofreció a ayudarnos a estudiar.
We expect to arrive on time.
I'm learning to play the guitar.
Estoy aprendiendo a tocar la guitarra.
A ella le disgusta limpiar la casa.
They are considering moving to a new city.
Ellos están considerando mudarse a una nueva ciudad.
I imagine living on a tropical island.
Imagino vivir en una isla tropical.
He practices playing the piano every day.
Él practica tocar el piano todos los días.
They suggested going to the beach.
Ellos sugirieron ir a la playa.
